pageContent: Aim: To assess outcomes of whole gland high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) as compared with minimally-invasive radical prostatectomy (MIRP) in elderly patients.

metaData.source:
Regarding: 'high-intensity-focused ultrasound in the treatment of primary prostate cancer: the first UK series'
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19997110/
